name: Wall Hopper (igoz)
description:
An endless game where you jump from one wall to another to avoid obstacles while climbing at an ever increasing pace.

Background art created by Ansimuz : https://opengameart.org/users/ansimuz
Fonts and sprites created by Kenney : https://www.kenney.nl/assets
Ambient audio created by Spring Spring : https://opengameart.org/users/spring-spring
